FlavorTextOption.Text: We have just received some alarming news. It seems that one of our ships has stumbled upon a dead ship. The crew has killed each other over a vast stash of credits found in the ship's hold. So far no one has mentioned the thefts, so we are not sure what we should do with the Credits.
We must track down the victims of this crime and return to them what was taken. [COLOR=BenevolentBlue](Benevolent +50, +5 Diplomacy)[/COLOR]
Let us put some effort into returning the credits to the victims, minus a generous salvage fee of course. [COLOR=PragmaticGold](Pragmatic +50, +2500 Credits)[/COLOR]
Let the victims know that the ship was empty when we found it. What a pity. [COLOR=WarRed](Malevolent +50, -5 Diplomacy, +5000 Credits)[/COLOR]
